attributes.action: Stop Banks Raising Stardard Variable Rate (SVR)
attributes.additional_details:
The Bank of England hasn't changed the Interest Rate yet ALL Banks seem to be increasing there Standard Variable Rate (SVR).  This is just going to hit all people with a mortgages in the UK.  For example I'm going to have to pay another £250 + per month and the interest rate is going from 2.99% to 4.49%

This is been done by all BANKS not just for example Lloyds or RBS.

Please support this campaign !!!!
